page.title: 01Introduction to Gleadless
page.content: The Gleadless area has developed over the past two decades from an extensively rural landscape and economy to that of one incorporating modern and prize winning architecture, landscaped environment and service industries. The area contains a multitude of housing styles,many being Council administered.The population tends to reflect the tenure.Few members of ethnic minorities live in the area but this is slowly changing with the increase in urban movement. The area, whilst not suffering from 'urban decay' still posses those aspects which tend to affect the communities desirability and commitment e.g.crime, unemployment, recreation... We hope these few pages will give a taste of the area as it is seen in 1985 by those residents.
